Package me.mayhem.util

Class UtilSharedResources

java.lang.Object
me.mayhem.util.UtilSharedResources
public class UtilSharedResources
extends java.lang.Object
Class used for more efficiently accessing the resources used throughout the game All the resources are obtained using lazy getters. This means they are initially null and upon the first time of calling the getter they are then instantiated and loaded. It also contains a map of all the level images which are loaded asynchronously at the start of the game as to prevent lag when swapping between levels.
